snippet: The deaths of eight soldiers stir tensions as Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton visits the region.
abstract: At least eight soldiers are killed in two days of renewed fighting along the border of Armenia and Azerbaijan, stirring tensions just as Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton is visiting the region.
lead_paragraph: The deaths of eight soldiers stir tensions as Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton visits the region.

headline.seo: Armenia-Azerbaijan Border Fighting Leaves 8 Soldiers Dead
headline.main: 8 Killed in Renewed Fighting on Armenia-Azerbaijan Border
